# comfyui-api

Headless and automated execution of ComfyUI workflows via HTTP and WebSocket: prompt submission, queue control, progress monitoring, error handling, outputs retrieval, and safe hosting defaults. Use when running workflows programmatically, building an API wrapper, or debugging API failures with node_errors and WebSocket events.
